topic.title: Strategic Partnership for Renewable Energy
topic.description: A company is seeking to partner with another firm to develop a large-scale renewable energy project.
topic.context: The two companies have been competitors in the industry for years, but both recognize the need for sustainable energy solutions.

conflictPoints.description: Conflicting demands for equity allocation and revenue sharing.

nonNegotiablePoints.rationale: GreenTech Inc. has exclusive rights to the technology used in the project.
nonNegotiablePoints.impact: Any attempt to use the technology without permission would be a breach of contract.

party1Conditions.condition: EcoEnergy Corp.'s unwillingness to renegotiate equity allocation terms.
party1Conditions.reasoning: GreenTech Inc. cannot tolerate such a significant concession, as it would compromise their investment strategy.

party2Conditions.condition: GreenTech Inc.'s failure to provide adequate support and resources for the project.
party2Conditions.reasoning: EcoEnergy Corp. requires substantial investment and technical assistance to deliver the technology effectively, which is not guaranteed by GreenTech Inc.
